body:
JSON timezone/time API usage ============================= * url: - [http://tiny.cc/currenttime](http://tiny.cc/currenttime)
* get all timezones: - [https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbxV_jj5blAvD9PKy3TSRZ5jNE-QAUiVWnQkuTss42w/exec?**tz=all**](https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbxV_jj5blAvD9PKy3TSRZ5jNE-QAUiVWnQkuTss42w/exec?tz=all)
* get time of a timezone: - [https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbxV_jj5blAvD9PKy3TSRZ5jNE-QAUiVWnQkuTss42w/exec?**tz**=Europe/Madrid](https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbxV_jj5blAvD9PKy3TSRZ5jNE-QAUiVWnQkuTss42w/exec?tz=Europe/Madrid)
* callback: - [https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbxV_jj5blAvD9PKy3TSRZ5jNE-QAUiVWnQkuTss42w/exec?**tz**=Europe/Madrid&**callback**=f](https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbxV_jj5blAvD9PKy3TSRZ5jNE-QAUiVWnQkuTss42w/exec?tz=Europe/Madrid&callback=f)
- [https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbxV_jj5blAvD9PKy3TSRZ5jNE-QAUiVWnQkuTss42w/exec?**tz=all**&**callback**=f](https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbxV_jj5blAvD9PKy3TSRZ5jNE-QAUiVWnQkuTss42w/exec?tz=all&callback=f)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Get current time for a timezone JSON api
name: Current Time JSON api (Google Apps Script)
